title: Ban discussion on Low priority Queue
body:
The National broadband network in my area is experiencing some fluctuations in terms of not correctly using the DNS server properly mid game.
This unfortunate occurrence has happened 3-4 times in the last week now and my low priority queue has gone from 5 minutes to 20 minutes wait before being recognised in a game queue.
how long do I have to consistently get lucky and not lose connection in a game to have this ban revoked because at this stage there really isn't a reward for clearing the penalty [ i.e completing 7+ games without having a disconnection ]
this penalty is extremely harsh and to make things worse waiting 20 minutes and locking in your pick to play then someone dodges queue and you don't ready up because of unfortunate timing you have to wait another 20 minutes to get recognised?? comeon riot help the community out a bit

replies.body:
If it's a DNS issue, I highly recommend setting your local machine to use Google's DNS servers as a primary or secondary, which should alleviate many of the issues.

Here's an article from Google on how to do so, including the addresses of their DNS servers: [https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using](https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using)

You could try using a VPN and manually set your DNS to try and connect a little easier, but ultimately if you're being disconnected then your teammates are still having to suffer from your dc's. This is the main reason for the LPQ, to protect other players. We won't be able to lift LPQ's knowing that the main issue isn't fixed yet. 

Try adjusting your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) focusing on the steps I mentioned above, test it in *custom games*, and let me know if that helps.

seems like an issue that's going to be overlooked, I feel as if I shouldn't be punished but your support team doesn't have the power to take matters further with my internet contractor so ill be the one liable.
and for someone who has been playing this game since 2011 without having a ban like this sort is very upsetting
Manually set your dns to another server?
